title: description
Cher's No Name: A strong mix between the No Name and the Exposition Cocktail. As strong as Cher's time.

title: notes
Cher's No Name: Seager, Gin and a dash of life.

title: pairing
Cher's No Name: Cher has it with a keep Peach Melba and shortcake.

title: serving_suggestion
Cher's No Name: Shake.. Drink to the hard sounds of Believe.
